overview: Prior to joining Terra-Gen, Mr. Hoffman was a Senior Vice President of Caithness, after joining Caithness Equities Corporation in March of 2000. Prior to joining Caithness, Mr. Hoffman was a Vice President of FPL Energy, Inc. From 1989 until 1993 he was the Vice President of Business Management of ESI Energy, Inc. Before 1989, Mr. Hoffman was employed by Florida Power & Light Company. Mr. Hoffman holds a Master of Business Administration degree from Florida International University and a Bachelor of Science degree from Rochester Institute of Technology.
